Condition_summary_1: The Proponent must conduct monitoring and reporting on offsetting measures, including post-construction assessments and fish sampling, with reports due by June 14, 2022.
Condition_summary_2: Structural stability and functionality of offsetting habitats must be maintained; contingency measures required if not met.
Condition_summary_3: Prohibition on depositing deleterious substances in water frequented by fish.
Condition_summary_4: Authorization cannot be transferred without prior notification to DFO.
Habitat_Type: Storm water management pond, tributary, drain, marsh
Fish_species: None explicitly listed in the provided sections
Offset_footprint_size: Storm water management pond (average depth 0.9m), unnamed tributary restoration, Hooper Drain channel, Central Drain channel, marsh habitat with berm
Woody_coverage: Habitat enhancement features (e.g., woody debris) in tributary restoration
Instream_structures: Pool/deepwater habitat in SWM pond, riffles in tributary, channel morphology in drains
